name: Room Box
description:
a Game made with LÖVE 11.3, for Weekly Game Jam - Week 173

a Top-Down Shooter with Procedural Generated Rooms, each with a chosen type of Challenge (kill, kill in order, dodge, treasure)

HINT : you cant hit enemies with a blue circle around them (found in "kill in order" room or "dodge" room)

Controls :

- WASD Keys - Move
- Mouse - Shoot
- R - Restart
- TAB - Toggle Map
- N - Next Song
- P - Shuffle
- I - Increase Volume
- O - Decrease Volume

INFO : If you encounter bugs feel free to comment it out, im sure there are bugs.

Credits:
- Kirito

to Play just extract and then Run the "play.bat" file.

Thanks for playing!
